mapper.sql: ASSETS_RECORD_M, ASSETS_RECORD, CONTRACT_NO, EQUIPMENT_CODE, FMODEL, SPEC, ORG_ID, PRODUCT_COUNTRY, PRODUCT, PRODUCT_TYPE, ORIGINAL_VALUE, SOURCE_FUNDS, B_DEPT_CODE, DEPOSIT, DEPOSIT_A, DEPOSIT_B, DEPOSIT_C, DEPOSIT_D, A_DEPT_CODE, PRODUCTION_DATE, USE_LIMIT, MAINTAIN_DAY, ASSETS_USE_ORG, QA_LEVEL, BUY_DATE, ACCT_DATE, DEPRECIATION_TYPE, DEPRECIATION_LIMIT, MONTH_DEPRECIATION_PRICE, TOTAL_DEPRECIATION_PRICE, USE_FSTATE, RECODR_DATE, CREATE_USERID, RESIDUAL_VALUE, CUSTODIAN, INSTALL_PRICE, MONEY_TYPE, OUT_RRPAIR_ORG, OUT_RRPAIR_USERNAME, OUT_RRPAIR_PHONE, USE_DEPT_CODE, BUY_PRICE, TF_ACCESSORY, QRCODE, M_DEPT_CODE, CARRYING_AMOUNT, RESIDUAL_VALUE_V, IN_DATE, RRPAIR_TYPE, MAINTAIN_TYPE
mapper.select:
select a.assets_record "assetsRecord" , e.equipment_standard_name "equipmentStandardName" , a.product_country "productCountry" , e.spec "spec" , e.fmodel "fmodel" , a.use_fstate "useFstate" , a.product_type "productType" , e.register_no "certGuid" , a.product "product" , a.use_dept_guid "useDeptCode" , (select dept_name from td_org_dept where dept_guid = a.use_dept_guid) "useDept" , a.deposit "deposit" , a.b_dept_guid "bDeptCode" , (select dept_name from td_org_dept where dept_guid = a.b_dept_guid) "bDept" , a.custodian "custodian" , a.buy_price "buyPrice" , a.install_price "installPrice" , a.source_funds "sourceFunds" , a.production_date "productionDate" ,
a.recodr_date "recodrDate" , a.acct_date "acctDate" , a.use_limit "useLimit" , a.depreciation_limit "depreciationLimit" , a.depreciation_type "depreciationType" , a.residual_value "residualValue" , a.qa_level "qalevel" , a.maintain_day "maintainDay" ,
a.OUT_RRPAIR_USERNAME "outRrpairUserName" , a.out_rrpair_phone "outRrpairPhone" , a.equipment_code "equipmentCode" , e.equipment_name "equipmentName" , a.deposit "address" , (select add_months(a.production_date,(12*a.use_limit) ) from dual) "validity" , a.tf_accessory "tfAccessory", to_char(a.buy_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') "buyDate" , a.rrpair_type "rrpairType" , a.maintain_type "maintainType" , a.in_date "inDate" , a.carrying_amount "carryingAmount" , a.assets_record_m "assetsRecordGuid" , a.guarantee_flag "guaranteeFlag" , a.spare "spare" , (select org_name from td_org_info o where o.org_id = a.f_org_id ) "fOrgName" , a.metering_type "meteringType" , a.next_maintain_date "nextMaintainDate" , a.RESIDUAL_VALUE_V "residualValueV" , a.contract_no "contractNo" , a.original_value "originalValue" , e.metering_unit "meteringUnit", a.tf_brand "tfBrand"
from td_assets_record a left join td_equipment e on (a.equipment_code = e.equipment_code) where 1 = 1
and a.assets_record_m = #{conditiions.assetsRecordGuid}
and (a.assets_record = #{conditiions.assetsRecord} or a.qrcode = #{conditiions.assetsRecord} )
mapper.insert:
insert into td_equipment (EQUIPMENT_CODE,EQUIPMENT_NAME,METERING_UNIT, EQUIPMENT_STANDARD_NAME,FMODEL,SPEC) select * from
select #{list[${index}].equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{list[${index}].equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{list[${index}].meteringUnit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{list[${index}].equipmentStandardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list[${index}].fmodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list[${index}].spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
